<<<<<<< HEAD
Here begynneth the temple of glas Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
[52] p.
Enprynted in London in Flete Strete in the sygne of the Conne by Wynkyn de Worde, [London] : [1506?]
In verse. Attributed to Lydgate by STC (2nd ed.). Publisher statement taken from colophon; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.). Signatures: A-B⁸ C⁶ D⁴. T.p. contains illustration. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
